Layer.SetMeCommand: %function(borderinnerer) local Zoomy = 5 borderinnerer:diffusealpha(2) borderinnerer:zoomto(Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5, Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5) borderinnerer:decelerate(60/195 * 0.75) borderinnerer:spin() borderinnerer:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) borderinnerer:diffusealpha(0.25) end

%function(borderinnerer) local Zoomy = 4.5 borderinnerer:diffusealpha(2) borderinnerer:z(50) borderinnerer:zoomto(Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5, Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5) borderinnerer:decelerate(60/195 * 0.75) borderinnerer:spin() borderinnerer:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) borderinnerer:diffusealpha(0.25) end

%function(borderinnerer) local Zoomy = 4 borderinnerer:diffusealpha(2) borderinnerer:z(50*2) borderinnerer:zoomto(Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5, Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5) borderinnerer:decelerate(60/195 * 0.75) borderinnerer:spin() borderinnerer:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) borderinnerer:diffusealpha(0.25) end

%function(borderinnerer) local Zoomy = 3.5 borderinnerer:diffusealpha(2) borderinnerer:z(50*3) borderinnerer:zoomto(Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5, Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5) borderinnerer:decelerate(60/195 * 0.75) borderinnerer:spin() borderinnerer:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) borderinnerer:diffusealpha(0.25) end

%function(borderinnerer) local Zoomy = 2 borderinnerer:diffusealpha(2) borderinnerer:z(50*6) borderinnerer:zoomto(Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5, Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5) borderinnerer:decelerate(60/195 * 0.75) borderinnerer:spin() borderinnerer:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) borderinnerer:diffusealpha(0.25) end

%function(borderinnerer) local Zoomy = 1.5 borderinnerer:diffusealpha(2) borderinnerer:z(50*7) borderinnerer:zoomto(Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5, Zoomy * SCREEN_WIDTH / 5) borderinnerer:decelerate(60/195 * 0.75) borderinnerer:spin() borderinnerer:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) borderinnerer:diffusealpha(0.25) end
